Reviews.Title: “Very good, will go back again”

Reviews.Content: third stay hotel laleli realy nice clean breakfast delicious hotel mid shopping istanbul close main attractions food step tram station main street laleli suggest hotel traveller

Reviews.Content: location near main attractions istanbul hagia sophia blue mosque grand bazaar stuff friendly helpful clean towels changed day air conditioning night window closed traffic noise breakfast buffet

Reviews.Content: exellent hotel service stayed hotel 4 nightsit wonderful hotel clean towels sheets changed day staff helped friendly solved days stay food value money restaurant nice views hotel near lot grand baazar haga sophia mosque spice bazar lot shopping centers recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “good location, good value for money”

Reviews.Content: hotel located 10 minutes walking distance sophia blue mosque 5 minutes grand bazar district laleli famous shopping district fan shopping strongly recommend obvious hotel renovated accommodation ok price hotel comparing quality mind guests hotel mainly russians possibly shop owners pretty noisy packing unpacking breakfast picky person ok service lobby basically exist numerous annoying missing bathroom tv properly organized underline price
